ORGANISATIONAL CHANGE ANNOUNCEMENT | RITC
After more than 30 years of dedicated service and leadership within the Group, Abdulghani Bazzi has decided to embark on a new chapter,  focusing on personal and professional pursuits.
 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1954&user=10620> 	

Throughout his time with the Group, Abdulghani has been instrumental in building a solid foundation for the Mass and FMCG operations and successfully establishing RITC. As part the leadership transition, Abdulghani will continue to support the business on few projects as a Consultant until the end of 2025. Thank you to Abdulghani for his leadership and long term dedication. Read More <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1954&user=10620>

TANAGRA CELEBRATES 
45 YEARS

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/df3c4cf2b0ac141931be053e0849af6c74711736.gif> 	

Tanagra has just launched its 45th anniversary campaign, taking everyone on a journey through the beloved French Maisons that first inspired its story. The campaign honours the artisans behind these creations, celebrating their craftsmanship and the stories they carry across generations.

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-7-min.png> 	

REPOSSI OPENING IN ABU DHABI

We’re proud to celebrate the opening of Repossi’s first boutique in Abu Dhabi, in exclusive partnership with Chalhoub Group. 

Blending heritage and modern design, the new space at The Galleria, Al Maryah Island marks the next chapter of our journey with the avant-garde Maison.
